virtual-sensor.name: Jungfraujoch_Dozer_DecagonMux__conv__1950
virtual-sensor.description: Converted dozer messages (DozerDecagonMuxMsg) from Jungfraujoch deployment

source.query: select POSITION, DEVICE_ID, GENERATION_TIME, TIMESTAMP, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_NO, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID0 = 0, NULL, cast(round(PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY0 / 50, 2) as CHAR(30))) as CONDUCTIVITY0, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID1 = 0, NULL, cast(round(PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY1 / 50, 2) as CHAR(30))) as CONDUCTIVITY1, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID2 = 0, NULL, cast(round(PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY2 / 50, 2) as CHAR(30))) as CONDUCTIVITY2, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID3 = 0, NULL, cast(round(PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY3 / 50, 2) as CHAR(30))) as CONDUCTIVITY3, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID4 = 0, NULL, cast(round(PAYLOAD_DATA_CONDUCTIVITY4 / 50, 2) as CHAR(30))) as CONDUCTIVITY4, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID0 = 0, NULL, cast(round(if(PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC0 between 0 and 700, PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC0 / 100, (700 + 5 * (PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC0 - 700)) / 100), 2) as CHAR(30))) as DIELECTRIC0, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID1 = 0, NULL, cast(round(if(PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC1 between 0 and 700, PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC1 / 100, (700 + 5 * (PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC1 - 700)) / 100), 2) as CHAR(30))) as DIELECTRIC1, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID2 = 0, NULL, cast(round(if(PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC2 between 0 and 700, PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC2 / 100, (700 + 5 * (PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC2 - 700)) / 100), 2) as CHAR(30))) as DIELECTRIC2, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID3 = 0, NULL, cast(round(if(PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC3 between 0 and 700, PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC3 / 100, (700 + 5 * (PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC3 - 700)) / 100), 2) as CHAR(30))) as DIELECTRIC3, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID4 = 0, NULL, cast(round(if(PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC4 between 0 and 700, PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC4 / 100, (700 + 5 * (PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC4 - 700)) / 100), 2) as CHAR(30))) as DIELECTRIC4, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID0 = 0, NULL, cast(round((PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE0 - 400) / 10, 1) as CHAR(30))) as TEMPERATURE0, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID1 = 0, NULL, cast(round((PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE1 - 400) / 10, 1) as CHAR(30))) as TEMPERATURE1, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID2 = 0, NULL, cast(round((PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE2 - 400) / 10, 1) as CHAR(30))) as TEMPERATURE2, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID3 = 0, NULL, cast(round((PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE3 - 400) / 10, 1) as CHAR(30))) as TEMPERATURE3, IF(PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID4 = 0, NULL, cast(round((PAYLOAD_DATA_TEMPERATURE4 - 400) / 10, 1) as CHAR(30))) as TEMPERATURE4 from wrapper
